question: He answered ***honestly***.
exp: उसले answer दियो तर कसरी? - honestly (ईमानदारीका साथ) ।

question: The ***green*** dragon kills other animals.
exp: Dragon ले अरु जनावर मार्छ तर कस्तो dragon ले? - हरियो ।

question: He bought a ***television***.
exp: Television भनेको वस्तु हो । यो Noun हो ।

question: Wait for me ***until*** I get there.
exp: 'Wait for me' र 'I will get there' दुईटा वाक्यलाई जोडेकोले ।

question: Cars were too expensive ***until*** now.
exp: कुनै वाक्यलाई नजोडि नेपालीमा निपात 'सम्म' को जस्तै काम गरेकाले ।

question: What is the ***trouble***?
exp: Trouble = समस्या । एउटा अमुर्त विचार भएकाले ।

question: They received Rs. 10 ***each***.
exp: each ले receive गर्ने Verb लाई वर्णन गरेकोले । सबैले १०-१० रु पाए।

question: The dog is a fool. ***It*** bites its own ***tail***.
exp: It ले dog लाई जनाएको र tail उसकै पुुच्छर भएकाले ।
